attributes.action: Review XL BULLY and BULLY TYPE breed ban
attributes.additional_details: Over turn this ban. All dogs should be licenced, on a lead in public unless it's an open space not near a playground for children and backyard breeding needs to be a prison sentence.
attributes.background:
This ban against bully "types" and XL bully has caused upset, worry on owners, will cause strain on vets and police  and harrassment to owners by dog haters. 
I have now had to start walking my non XL bully dog in the forest at night as a lone woman so I don't get bullied by dog haters.

rejection.details:
Scrap ban on dog breeds, regulate dog owners and ban euthanasia of healthy dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652050

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
